sentences.en: Did he bet that day? Is the Pope Catholic?.
sentences.cn: 他那天赌博了吗？那可是显而易见的事。

sentences.en: During his visit, the Pope will also bless the new hospital.
sentences.cn: 在访问期间，教皇还将为新医院祈福。

sentences.en: He was appointed Apostolic Administrator of Minsk by Pope John Paul II.
sentences.cn: 他被教皇约翰·保罗二世任命为明斯克区的宗座署理。

sentences.en: His Holiness Pope John Paul II
sentences.cn: 教皇圣座约翰∙保罗二世

sentences.en: In May, Pope John Paul is to beatify Gianna Beretta.
sentences.cn: 5月，教皇约翰·保罗将为吉安娜·贝雷塔行宣福礼。

sentences.en: Joan of Arc was finally canonized by Pope Benedict XV in 1920.
sentences.cn: 圣女贞德终于在1920年由教皇本尼狄克十五世封为圣徒。

sentences.en: Nobody else believed that they had tried to rub out the pope.
sentences.cn: 其他人都不相信他们试图杀死教皇。

sentences.en: Pope John Paul received a rapturous reception when he visited East Timor.
sentences.cn: 在访问东帝汶期间，教皇约翰·保罗受到了热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: the election of a new pope
The highlight of the pope's visit will be his message to the people.
sentences.cn: 教皇访问的亮点是，他将给人们传达训诫。

sentences.en: The Pope bluntly told the world's priests yesterday to stay celibate.
sentences.cn: 教皇昨天直言全世界的神父都应该禁欲。

sentences.en: The Pope called for a halt to the shedding of innocent blood.
sentences.cn: 教皇呼吁不要滥杀无辜。

sentences.en: The Pope has anointed him as Archbishop.
sentences.cn: 教皇给他施了涂油礼，任命其为大主教。

sentences.en: The Pope is the spiritual leader of many Christians.
sentences.cn: 教皇是众多基督徒的宗教领袖.

sentences.en: The Pope was speaking ex cathedra.
sentences.cn: 教皇以宗座权威正式宣言。

sentences.en: The Pope will visit El Salvador this year.
sentences.cn: 教皇今年将访问萨尔瓦多。

sentences.en: The Pope's hands were raised in benediction.
The president had an audience with the Pope in the Vatican.
sentences.cn: 总统在梵蒂冈谒见了教皇。

words.tran_cn: 教皇，罗马教皇；权威，大师

phrases.tran_cn: 亚历山大·蒲柏（英国诗人）
(非正式)教皇是天主教徒吗？；那可是显而易见的事
教皇本笃十六世（现任天主教教宗）

trans.tran_cn: 罗马教皇，主教，权威，大师
trans.tran_en: the leader of the Roman Catholic Church
